name: Something is a-Brewin
description:
Delthor's Game Jam - 5th Edition 🎮

Hosted by Delthor Games

Play as a wizard 🧙‍♂️, a potion shopkeeper brewing custom potions for needy customers! There are 4 types of potions: strength 💪, speed ⚡, and smarts 🧠, granting boosts in the human body in each of those attributes. There are specific ingredients needed to brew each potion 🧪. Then, there's poison ☠️: the result of mixing ingredients incorrectly. It could turn your customers into goblins. Wouldn't want that....👿

NOTE: I looked up which foods make you stronger, faster, and smarter and incorporated those into the recipes for potions in game. I wouldn't mix them, but try eating them, as they do make you stronger, faster, and smarter, lol 🤣

All art, music and sound effects made by BurterButterBeans Studio!

Enjoy 😄
